item.title: Megaman Zero Ores and Tools Mod!
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

UPDATE:

For the graphics, I’m ~75% done (tool sets and actual objects), and I still need to code for 4 more tool sets and ores. After that, I’ll release, tend to any issues, and probably touch up graphics a bit more (which is all I got done today so far Remaking the Z Gem and Z Stone, remaking the next 6 gems, and currently making the storage blocks for them).

Read full topic
